## Linear Regression Boston Dataset
```{r}
library(MASS)
head(Boston)
```

```{r}
linear_model <- lm(medv~lstat, data = Boston)
linear_model
```

```{r}
summary(linear_model)
```
```{r}
names(linear_model)
```

```{r}
attach(Boston)
plot(lstat, medv)
abline(linear_model)
```
